skill.name: agent.behaviors.skills.primitives.CreateResourceNetWorkLinks
skill.description:
For an gent to know how to create new resource links between a node and a list of objects that need this resource ('resourceReceivers' list).
When several links should be created, the agent acts on each target by following the order of the elements into the 'resourceReceivers' list.

link.name: reach
link.description: To move toward the resource node from which the link will be created.

feedback.name: linkCreated
feedback.description: Sent once a target object has been linked to the resource node.

argument.name: resourceReceiver
argument.description: The target object that has been connected with the resource node.

feedback.name: done
feedback.description: Sent when all "resourceReceivers" have been visited (all links have been created).

feedback.name: failed
feedback.description: Sent if the set of "resourceReceivers" is empty (no element to act on).
